title._content: Image taken from page 6 of 'The Duchess de la Vallière. A play in five acts. By the author of “Eugene Aram,” etc. [The preface signed: E. L. B., i.e. Edward G. E. L. Bulwer, afterwards Bulwer-Lytton.]'
